lore: Most Imps ignore that Torun is a God, a being whose power IS BEYOND THEIR !@#$ING UNDERSTANDING. Some of them insult him and even throw small stones at him. The God of Anger simply curses them, unless someone dares to say the word "tasty". I WILL !@#$ING KILL YOU IF YOU SAY IT.\n\nImp Sacrificers perform a ritual in front of their idols, sacrificing an animal in exchange for their favor. The faith of this creature somehow causes spells to manifest spontaneously when it is in danger.
menagerieDialog: Got any more of them feel-goods?
We go visit Torun and spit on altar! Go now!
We go to war... without crab helmets? No, no. Stupid. Very stupid.
(It's wearing a crab on its head while eating a bunch of mushrooms, many of which are sure to be poisonous.)
Step one, take feelgood of choice. Step two, mash in hands. Step three, eat. Step four, enjoy!
name: Imp Sacrificer
